long_description: The large SMC snow anchor works in nearly any type of snow, from wet and heavy to light and powdery, when you need to set up a running belay or anchor your tent in extreme wind. Angled aluminum blade has a 1/8-in. diameter steel cable that's positioned to enable the anchor to dive deeper when loaded, piling up snow ahead of it. Cutout holes give the blade excellent bite in snow. Large size is a good choice for use in extreme conditions and with large mountaineering tents. The large SMC snow anchor doubles as an emergency digging tool.
short_description: The large SMC snow anchor works in nearly any type of snow, from wet and heavy to light and powdery, when you need to set up a running belay or anchor your tent in extreme wind.
